headline: Blackstone Real Estate Completes Privatization of Retail Opportunity Investments Corp. for $4 Billion
summary: NEW YORK & SAN DIEGO, February 12, 2025--Blackstone (NYSE: BX) and Retail Opportunity Investments Corp. ("ROIC" or the "Company") today announced that Blackstone Real Estate Partners X ("Blackstone") has completed its previously announced acquisition of all outstanding common shares of ROIC for $17.50 per share in an all-cash transaction valued at approximately $4 billion, including outstanding debt.

headline: Bain Capital Eyes $340 Million Loan for Blackstone’s Avery Lodge
